ðŸŽ“ Week 4: Final Credits and Project Defense

The home stretch! This week we had the Information Theory credit â€” the format included a mini-test and short answer questions. The professor turned it into a lively discussion, which actually made it fun.

I also presented my course project pre-defense. I showcased a business process model for an online store and received helpful feedback and visualization tips.

Spent the weekend relaxing a bit and organizing my notes â€” the final exam is just around the corner.
